system.description:
Time: 15−RSI seconds+Ritual: Prayer
Range: RSI hexes+Duration: 1 (MS); 3 (CS) mins

Invoker’s breathe is foul and causes nausea and sickness in those within Range. Victims roll vs SML ×3 (MS) or SML ×5 (CS) or lose their turn due to nausea. Alternatively, the invoker can project a massive blast of air, causing a strong (MS) or gale force wind (CS). This may be enough to deflect missiles, or knockback opponents, at GM discretion.
